content.question: The House and the Senate have some different constitutional responsibilities. Which of the following pairs correctly matches House and Senate constitutional responsibilities?

choices.label: House of Representatives Senate Initiates all revenue bills introduced into Congress. Passes resolutions to ratify treaties.
House of Representatives Senate Drafts articles of impeachment. Elects the president if there is not a majority of votes in the electoral college.
House of Representatives Senate Confirms federal judges. Has limited debate.
House of Representatives Senate Can call on the vice president to break ties on votes. Confirms cabinet appointments.

content.answer: House of Representatives Senate Initiates all revenue bills introduced into Congress. Passes resolutions to ratify treaties.

topic.text: 2.1: Congress: The Senate and the House of Representatives

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Compare political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
